text: Breytovo () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Breytovsky District of Yaroslavl Oblast, Russia. Population: ==History== The first written sources mentioning the place and its surroundings are related to weaving crafts in ancient Russia. On February 28, 1934, the village of Breytovo was officially reunited with the neighboring village of Zaruchye, all taking the name Breytovo.
